description: the dashboard for all services of cloudera

panels.title: 各 RegionServers 中的总 区域
整个 RegionServers 中的 区域

targets.target: select health_good_rate * 100 as "good health", health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName="hbase"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="hbase"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where category=ROLE and serviceName="hbase" and roleType=MASTER

panels.title: 整个 RegionServers 中的 警报
整个 RegionServers 中的 关键事件

targets.target: select dfs_capacity, dfs_capacity_used, dfs_capacity_used_non_hdfs where entityName="hdfs"

panels.title: 各 DataNodes 中的总 已写入块
各 DataNodes 中的总 收发器
整个 DataNodes 中的 收发器
整个 DataNodes 中的 数据包确认往返的平均时间
各 DataNodes 中的总 读取块
整个 DataNodes 中的 发送网络阻止数据包的平均时间
整个 DataNodes 中的 磁盘刷新
整个 DataNodes 中的 平均磁盘刷新时间
整个 DataNodes 中的 警报
整个 DataNodes 中的 关键事件
各 DataNodes 中的总 写入的字节

targets.target: select health_good_rate * 100 as "good health", health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName="hdfs"

panels.title: 各 DataNodes 中的总 读取的字节

targets.target: select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where serviceType=HDFS AND clusterId=1 and category = SERVICE

panels.title: 整个 DataNodes 中的 发送数据包传输的平均时间

targets.target: select kafka_active_controller where category = ROLE and roleType = KAFKA_BROKER and serviceName ="kafka" and max(kafka_active_controller) != 0

panels.title: 各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Messages Received
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Bytes Received
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Bytes Fetched
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Partitions
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Leader Replicas
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Offline Partitions
各 Kafka Brokers 中的总 Under Replicated Partitions

targets.target: select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="kafka"
select total_read_bytes_rate_across_disks, total_write_bytes_rate_across_disks where category = CLUSTER
select total_bytes_read_rate_across_datanodes, total_bytes_written_rate_across_datanodes where category = SERVICE and serviceType = HDFS
select cpu_system_rate + cpu_user_rate where category=ROLE and serviceName="oozie"

select health_good_rate * 100 as "good health", health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName="oozie"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="oozie"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate) where category=role and serviceName="oozie"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="spark_on_yarn"
select apps_running_cumulative where category=YARN_POOL and serviceName="yarn" and queueName=root

panels.title: 正在运行的应用程序（累计）

targets.target: select apps_killed_cumulative_rate where category=YARN_POOL and serviceName="yarn" and queueName=root

panels.title: 已停止的应用程序（累计）
各 NodeManagers 中的总 正在运行的容器

targets.target: select pending_containers_cumulative where category=YARN_POOL and serviceName="yarn" and queueName=root
select apps_failed_cumulative_rate where category=YARN_POOL and serviceName="yarn" and queueName=root

select health_good_rate * 100 as "good health", health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName="yarn"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="yarn"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where category=ROLE and serviceName="yarn" and roleType=RESOURCEMANAGER

panels.title: 整个 NodeManagers 中的 警报
整个 NodeManagers 中的 关键事件
各 NodeManagers 中的总 已失败的容器

targets.target: select cpu_system_rate + cpu_user_rate where category=ROLE and serviceName="zookeeper"

select health_good_rate * 100 as "good health", health_concerning_rate * 100 as "concerning health", health_bad_rate * 100 as "bad health", health_disabled_rate * 100 as "disabled health", health_unknown_rate * 100 as "unknown health" where entityName="zookeeper"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate), integral(events_important_rate) where entityName="zookeeper"
select integral(alerts_rate), integral(events_critical_rate) where category=role and serviceName="zookeeper"

title: ClouderaManager
